name: Cyber Lancer (iwilliams, Warkus, ViktorRKraus, Modus Interactive, Pokop_Pokopson)
name_original: Cyber Lancer (iwilliams, Warkus, ViktorRKraus, Modus Interactive, Pokop_Pokopson)
description:
Made for Mech Jam III

Pilot the Hyper-Advanced, mechanized assault suit: Cyberlancer.
 Purchase and upgrade weapons to take down waves upon waves of enemies! Feast your eyes on Mind-Melting Sega Saturn inspired graphics!

 

 Controls: Keyboard & MouseControllerMoveWASDLeft Analog StickDashShiftR1Primary WeaponLeft Mouse ButtonR2Secondary WeaponRight Mouse ButtonL2Pause GameEscapeStartToggle FullscreenAlt + Enter
